message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. My initial offer is $1400000. What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a budget to stick to.

I understand you have a budget constraint, Bob, but I'm afraid I need to make a profit on this sale. My counteroffer is $1350000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to ensure I get a good deal. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to go up to $1250000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me there?

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob, but I'm still not getting the price I'm looking for. My counteroffer is $1300000. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair deal. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to go up to $1220000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me there?

I understand you're trying to stretch your budget, Bob, but I'm still not getting the price I'm looking for. I'm willing to meet you halfway on this one, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair deal. My counteroffer is $1290000. I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not willing to give up too much more. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to go up to $1200000, but that's my absolute maximum. I'm not willing to go any higher. Can you meet me there?

I understand you're trying to stick to your budget, Bob, but I'm running low on patience. I'm willing to make one last offer. My counteroffer is $1280000. I'm not going to go any lower than this, so you'll need to decide if it's a deal you can live with. What do you think?
